name: Krishna Shalawadi

education.Degree: B.E. in Information Science and Engineering

projects.Title: House Price Prediction using Machine Learning
projects.Description: Built a predictive model for house prices based on features using Python, compared different models, and evaluated performance using various metrics.

projects.Title: Brain Tumor Detection and Classification using MRI & Quantum ML
projects.Description: Led development of hybrid classical and quantum ML models in MRI brain tumor classification, built and compared classical models, experimented with quantum models, and authored a research paper on model performance.

summary: Information Science undergraduate with hands-on experience in software development, machine learning, and quantum computing. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, and ReactJS, with a strong track record of leading technical projects and research, and skilled in building data-driven solutions in team environments.
